name: knime-pagebuilder
description: PageBuilder for KNIMEÂ® Analytics Platform & WebPortal

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run opensourcecredits -- -- -- --no-overwrite" "npm run build:mock:lib" "npm run build:mock:html" && concurrently -n server,app -c yellow,blue "http-server -c-1 --cors -p 4000 dist http-server" "vue-cli-service serve src/dev.js"
scripts.dev:ap: npm run build && npm run build:lib:dev
scripts.dev:webportal: concurrently -n server,app -c yellow,blue "http-server -c-1 --cors -p 4000 dist/ http-server" "npm run build:credits && npm run build:lib -- --watch"
scripts.build: npm run build:credits && npm run build:lib && npm run build:wrapper
scripts.build:credits: npm run opensourcecredits && vue-cli-service build --target lib --formats umd-min --name knime-pagebuilder-credits src/components/PageBuilderCredits.vue
scripts.build:mock:lib: vue-cli-service build --no-clean --target lib --formats umd-min --name "org.knime.base.views.MockUIExtComponent.MockUIExtComponent" --filename MockUIExtComponent src/dev/views/MockUIExtComponent.vue
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:json
scripts.lint:ci: eslint --ext .js,.vue,.json -f json -o target/eslint.json || true; stylelint '**/*.{css,vue}' -f json -o target/stylelint.json || true

author: KNIME AG, Zurich, Switzerland
